abstract: The array of asset keys to be automatically loaded before the player item is ready to play.
overview:
## Discussion

The value of each key in `automaticallyLoadedAssetKeys` will automatically be loaded by the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerItem/asset] prior to the player item reaching a status of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerItem/Status-swift.enum/readyToPlay]. When this status is reached, the asset’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsynchronousKeyValueLoading/statusOfValue(forKey:error:)] method returns [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVKeyValueStatus/loaded] for the status of all keys in the array. If loading of any of the asset’s key values fails, the player item’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerItem/status-swift.property] will change to [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerItem/Status-swift.enum/failed].

# automaticallyLoadedAssetKeys

**Instance Property**

The array of asset keys to be automatically loaded before the player item is ready to play.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated var automaticallyLoadedAssetKeys: [String] { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of each key in `automaticallyLoadedAssetKeys` will automatically be loaded by the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerItem/asset] prior to the player item reaching a status of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerItem/Status-swift.enum/readyToPlay]. When this status is reached, the asset’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsynchronousKeyValueLoading/statusOfValue(forKey:error:)] method returns [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVKeyValueStatus/loaded] for the status of all keys in the array. If loading of any of the asset’s key values fails, the player item’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerItem/status-swift.property] will change to [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerItem/Status-swift.enum/failed].

## Accessing initialization parameters

- **asset**: The asset provided during initialization.
title: automaticallyLoadedAssetKeys
